alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Cuyahoga; Erie; Geauga; Huron; Lorain; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 3:34PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Portage... southwestern Mahoning...Huron...Erie...southwestern Geauga... Medina...Cuyahoga...northern Ashland...northeastern Stark...Summit and Lorain Counties Until 500 PM EST.... At 332 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Bellevue to near Hudson, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Elyria, Medina, Norwalk, Ravenna, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent, Barberton, Green, Solon, and Hudson. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 301, 302, 303, 304, 305, 306, 307, 308, 310, 316, 317, 318, 319, 321, 322, 323, 324, 325, 327, 328, 329, 601, 602, 603, 606, 607, 612, 613, 614, 615, 616, 617, 604, and 605.
